visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type is 'line', chart title is 'Monthly Average Rainfall', axes and labels styling includes a font size of 12px for labels and titles, data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with monthly data, custom colors are not specified, and additional configurations include a legend positioned at the top-left with a white background and a tooltip displaying the series name and point data.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart with a specified height of 400 pixels. The chart title is set to 'Monthly Average Rainfall', and both the x-axis and y-axis labels, along with the title, are styled with a font size of 12px. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, while the y-axis title indicates the unit of measurement as 'Rainfall (mm)'. The data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with monthly data points. The legend is positioned at the top-left with a white background, and the tooltip displays the series name and the point data in millimeters. This configuration ensures a clear and informative visualization of the monthly average rainfall data.
